Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Limits the hours of certain businesses located near schools
Summary: Prohibits adult-use dispensing facilities and tobacco businesses from opening until one hour after the latest beginning of a school day of any school located within one mile of the facility or business.
LawCode: Amd ยง85, Cannabis L; add ยง1399-cc-1, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the cannabis law and the public health law, in relation to limiting the hours of certain businesses located near schools
